name: Air Fryer Pizza Dogs
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Perfectly crisp hot dogs and pizza toppings are combined in this kid-friendly recipe. They are made in an air fryer from start to finish and ready in no time.
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 390 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Make 4 slits down each hot dog
Place hot dogs in the air fryer basket and cook for 3 minutes
Transfer to a cutting board using tongs
Place a pepperoni half in each slit of the hot dogs
Divide pizza sauce between buns and fill with the hot dogs, mozzarella cheese, and olives
Return hot dogs to the air fryer basket and cook until buns are crisp and cheese is melted, about 2 minutes
